FuncDef: This command enables context to enter match criteria for LI IPv4 filter and optionally allows specifying protocol value to match on.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the decimal value representing the IP protocol to be used as an IP filter match criterion. Well known protocol numbers include ICMP(1), TCP(6), UDP(17). Values-0 to 255 (values can be expressed in decimal, hexadecimal, or binary - DHB).
